title: India’s Elon Musk — and his EVs — need to be less combustible
description: Bhavish Aggarwal, founder of Ola Electric Mobility Ltd., engaged in an online dispute with comedian Kunal Kamra. The altercation was sparked by Kamra's criticism of Ola scooters' quality and service. Aggarwal's confrontational response has drawn public backlash, highlighting his company's broader challenges amidst government scrutiny and consumer dissatisfaction.
